DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether extracorporeal circulation during cardiac surgery has an influence on ADAMTS13-Activity.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Extracorporeal Circulation During Cardiac Surgery on the Development of Postoperative Thrombotic Thrombocytopenic Purpura (TTP)
DOC.criteria: cardiac surgery with or without (OPCAB) the use of extracorporeal circulation patient agrees no agreement known TTP in medical history
